pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction of Wildland Fire Behavior and Hazard // Fire behavior prediction models, including the Scott Reinhardt's (2001) Rothermel Wildland Fire Modelling System DOI:10.2737/RMRS-RP-29 and Alexander et al.'s (2006) Crown Fire Initiation Spread model DOI:10.1016/j.foreco.2006.08.174. Also contains sample datasets, estimation of fire behavior prediction model inputs (e.g., fuel moisture, canopy characteristics, wind adjustment factor), results visualization, and methods to estimate fire weather hazard.
